channel.title: Just a quick question on shops PI
channel.description: hi so i recently been successful in adding shops to my rsps.. one problem, i added one item to test it i used the item code 10499 this is the item ava's accumulater anyways when i did the action.java and added shops and signed on there was an archer shop and when i traded him all these items came up d hide, arrows etc.. why did all this come up when i only added one this happened with my genrnal store as well

item.title: Just a quick question on shops PI
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“Sup22211, post:6, topic:502349”][quote author=Fire capez link=topic=620577.msg4249120#msg4249120 date=1362243468]
the items being displayed on the shop interface are coming from somewhere; find the point of origin.
[/quote]
thats what i said…[/quote]
LOL

Read full topic
item.source: Just a quick question on shops PI
